DOC.brief_summary: Hypothesis : 25-hydroxy vitamin D level non-itching hemodialysis ( HD ) patient higher HD patient itch 25-hydroxy vitamin D level measure non-itching hemodialysis patient compare level previously measure previous study 25-hydroxy vitamin D level patient complain itching .
DOC.brief_title: A Study 25-hydroxy Vitamin Levels Non-itching Hemodialysis Patients
DOC.detailed_description: 25-hydroxy vitamin D level non-itching HD patient study compare 25-hydroxy vitamin D level ongoing study HD patient itch . The primary endpoint study continuous variable . Student 's test use test statistical significance . Multiple regression analysis use control covariates test interaction among covariates .
DOC.criteria: Hemodialysis treatment > 3 month No complaint itch within 1 month prior study enrollment Age < 18 year Failure provide inform consent Intact PTH < 70 pg/ml > 1,000 pg/ml Serum phosphorus > 7.0 Serum calcium ( adjust albumin ) > 11 Active malignancy Likelihood imminent renal transplantation Current ergocalciferol treatment
